SELECT TRIP_TITLE, TRIP_INTRO, TRIP_START_DATE, TRIP_MEET_LOCATION, TRIP_INCLUDE, TRIP_N_INCLUDE, TRIP_END_DATE, TRIP_TITLE, TRIP_INTRO, TRIP_START_DATE, TRIP_MEET_LOCATION, TRIP_INCLUDE, TRIP_N_INCLUDE, TRIP_END_DATE, TRIP_IMAGE_SAVED_NAME, TRIP_IMAGE_TYPE_CODE, TRIP_IMAGE_ORIGIN_NAME, TRIP_COURSE_CODE, TRIP_COURSE_NAME, TRIP_COURSE_INFO, TRANSIT_CHOICE_CODE, t3.TRANSIT_CODE, TRANSIT_DETAIL, THEME_DETAIL, THEME_CHOICE_CODE, t2.THEME_CODE, t.TRIP_CODE, TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE,
IFNULL(iv.CNT, 0) as rvcnt,
J_TRIP_CODE, J_TRIP_MAXIMIM, ti.TRIP_IMAGE_CODE FROM JOIN_TRIP jt JOIN TRIP t ON (jt.TRIP_CODE = t.TRIP_CODE)
G_TRIP_CODE, G_TRIP_PAYMENT, G_TRIP_MINIMUM, G_TRIP_MAXIMUM, ti.TRIP_IMAGE_CODE FROM GUIDE_TRIP gt JOIN TRIP t ON (gt.TRIP_CODE = t.TRIP_CODE)
U_TRIP_CODE, U_TRIP_COMENT_TITLE, U_TRIP_COMENT_INFO, U_TRIP_COMENT_POINT, ti.TRIP_IMAGE_CODE FROM USER_TRIP ut JOIN TRIP t ON (ut.TRIP_CODE = t.TRIP_CODE)
JOIN TRIP_IMAGE ti ON (t.TRIP_CODE = ti.TRIP_CODE) LEFT JOIN TRIP_COURSE tc ON (ti.TRIP_IMAGE_CODE = tc.TRIP_IMAGE_CODE) JOIN TRIP_THEME_CHOICE ttc ON (t.TRIP_CODE = ttc.TRIP_CODE) JOIN THEME t2 ON (ttc.THEME_CODE = t2.THEME_CODE) JOIN TRANSIT_CHOICE tc2 ON (t.TRIP_CODE = tc2.TRIP_CODE) JOIN TRANSIT t3 ON (tc2.TRANSIT_CODE = t3.TRANSIT_CODE) JOIN TRIP_REGIST_LIST trl ON (t.TRIP_CODE = trl.TRIP_CODE)
WHERE t.TRIP_CODE = #{tripCode}
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TRIP_CODE, COUNT(tr.TRIP_REVIEW_CODE) as CNT FROM TRIP_REGIST_LIST trl2 JOIN JOIN_TRIP_APPLY jta ON (trl2.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = jta.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) JOIN TRIP_REVIEW tr ON (jta.JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE = tr.JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE) WHERE trl2.TRIP_TYPE_CODE = #{condition.tripType} AND trl2.REGIST_TYPE_CODE = 3 GROUP BY trl2.TRIP_CODE ) as iv ON (t.TRIP_CODE = iv.TRIP_CODE)
WHERE trl.TRIP_TYPE_CODE = #{condition.tripType} AND trl.REGIST_TYPE_CODE = 3
ORDER BY t.TRIP_CODE DESC
ORDER BY rvcnt DESC;
WHERE trl.TRIP_TYPE_CODE = #{condition.tripType} AND trl.REGIST_TYPE_CODE = 3 AND ttc.THEME_CODE = #{condition.sortTheme}
ORDER BY t.TRIP_CODE DESC
ORDER BY rvcnt DESC;

SELECT tr.TRIP_REVIEW_CODE, TRIP_REVIEW_TITLE, TRIP_REVIEW_CONTENT, TRIP_REVIEW_DATE, TRIP_REVIEW_GRADE, tr2.TRIP_REPLY_CODE, tr2.TRIP_REPLY_DETAIL, tr2.TRIP_REPLY_DATE, ri.REVIEW_IMAGE_CODE , ri.REVIEW_IMAGE_ORIGIN_NAME, ri.REVIEW_IMAGE_SAVED_NAME FROM TRIP_REGIST_LIST trl JOIN JOIN_TRIP_APPLY jta ON ( trl.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = jta.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) JOIN TRIP_REVIEW tr ON ( jta.JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE = tr.JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE) JOIN TRIP_REPLY tr2 ON (tr.TRIP_REVIEW_CODE = tr2.TRIP_REVIEW_CODE) JOIN REVIEW_IMAGE ri ON (tr.TRIP_REVIEW_CODE = ri.TRIP_REVIEW_CODE) WHERE trl.TRIP_CODE = #{tripCode}

SELECT g.GUIDE_CODE, GUIDE_CAR_YN, GUIDE_EXP_YN, GUIDE_NICKNAME, GUIDE_INTRO, g.USER_CODE, GUIDE_YN, g.GUIDE_LEVEL_CODE, GUIDE_LEVEL_DETAIL, g.RESIDENCE_PERIOD_CODE, RESIDENCE_PERIOD_DETAIL, gsc.GUIDE_STYLE_CODE, gs.GUIDE_STYLE_DETAIL, gi.GUIDE_IMAGE_ORIGIN_NAME, gi.GUIDE_IMAGE_SAVED_NAME, gi.GUIDE_IMAGE_TYPE_CODE FROM TRIP_REGIST_LIST trl JOIN GUIDE g ON (trl.USER_CODE = g.USER_CODE) JOIN GUIDE_LEVEL gl ON (g.GUIDE_LEVEL_CODE = gl.GUIDE_LEVEL_CODE) JOIN RESIDENCE_PERIOD rp ON (g.RESIDENCE_PERIOD_CODE = rp.RESIDENCE_PERIOD_CODE ) JOIN GUIDE_STYLE_CHOICE gsc ON (g.GUIDE_CODE = gsc.GUIDE_CODE) JOIN GUIDE_STYLE gs ON (gsc.GUIDE_STYLE_CODE = gs.GUIDE_STYLE_CODE) JOIN GUIDE_IMAGE gi ON (g.USER_CODE = gi.USER_CODE) WHERE trl.TRIP_CODE = #{tripCode}
